  • Method Details

    • sendFriendRequest

      @PostMapping("/friends/request/{targetUserId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> sendFriendRequest(@PathVariable String targetUserId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Sends a friend request from the authenticated user to the target user.
      Parameters:
      targetUserId - the ID of the user to whom the friend request is being sent
      authentication - the authentication object containing details about the current user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the result of the friend request operation

    • acceptFriendRequest

      @PostMapping("/friends/accept/{friendshipId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> acceptFriendRequest(@PathVariable String friendshipId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Accepts a pending friend request for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      friendshipId - the ID of the friendship request to be accepted
      authentication - the authentication object containing details of the currently authenticated user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the result of the operation, including success or error messages

    • declineFriendRequest

      @PostMapping("/friends/decline/{friendshipId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> declineFriendRequest(@PathVariable String friendshipId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Declines a pending friend request for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      friendshipId - the ID of the friendship request to be declined
      authentication - the authentication object containing details of the currently authenticated user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the result of the operation, such as success or error messages

    • getFriends

      @GetMapping("/friends") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserResponseDTO>> getFriends(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Retrieves the list of friends for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication object containing details of the currently authenticated user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of UserResponseDTO representing the user's friends,

    • getUserFriends

      @GetMapping("/friends/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserResponseDTO>> getUserFriends(@PathVariable String userId)
      Retrieves the list of friends for a specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose friends' list is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of UserResponseDTO objects that represent the friends of the user

    • getPendingRequests

      @GetMapping("/friends/requests") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<FriendRequestDTO>> getPendingRequests(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Retrieves the list of pending friend requests for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication object containing details of the currently authenticated user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of FriendRequestDTO objects representing the pending friend requests

    • removeFriend

      @DeleteMapping("/friends/{friendUserId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> removeFriend(@PathVariable String friendUserId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Removes a friend for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      friendUserId - the ID of the friend to be removed
      authentication - the authentication object containing details of the currently authenticated user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the result of the operation, such as success or error messages

    • getMyPoints

      @GetMapping("/points") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserPointsDTO> getMyPoints(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Retrieves the current user's points information.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication object containing details of the currently authenticated user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a UserPointsDTO object with the user's points information

    • getUserPoints

      @GetMapping("/points/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserPointsDTO> getUserPoints(@PathVariable String userId)
      Retrieves the point information of a specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose points information is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a UserPointsDTO object with the user's points information

    • getLeaderboard

      @GetMapping("/leaderboard") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserPointsDTO>> getLeaderboard(@RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int limit)
      Retrieves the leaderboard information based on user points.
      Parameters:
      limit - the maximum number of users to include in the leaderboard; defaults to 10 if not specified
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of UserPointsDTO objects representing the users and their points
